channel.title: .......Java things=virus?
channel.description:
i have a good question....... but first let me tell you a story.....
i got on my comp and started it up. when it finished loading i run my anti virus prog since its been a while since i did a scan. then around 10 files show up before its even done saying it has a virus in it..... names of virus are
Java/ByteVerify!exploit Java/Shinwow.BJ
they all are in files with the word java in it..... so i was wondering if these are real viruses or are some java files recognized by the scanner to be a virus? i need answer ASAP before i delete those files.......

item.title: .......Java things=virus?
item.dc:creator: @Haxor_X Haxor X
item.description:
@Haxor_X wrote:

i did get it from java.com

and only one i download was JDK6…

Read full topic

item.title: .......Java things=virus?

item.description:
@lil_wizzy wrote:

if you didnt download from the java website its most likely you got it from a dodgy website and includes a virus.
